channel.title: DecaDAZED - Hard Rock'n'roll
channel.description:
Hello!
My brother have a band, and they wish to get their music out to as many as possible. Therefore I thought it would be a great thing to write about them here, in case someone here find them interesting.
Anyhow, they are called DecaDAZED, and the genre is what you can call Hard Rock'n'roll (atleast that is what they say themselves).
They have just recently made a video to one of their songs, called 'Entrust Me'. It can be watched at the following YouTube-link [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z7kO1B-uOWM]here[/url].
They also got a MySpace-account, which is called DecaDAZED, just like their band-name (obviously). So if you like their video, you perhaps might want to check them out there aswell...
Hope you like. :)

item.title: DecaDAZED - Hard Rock'n'roll
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Hello!

My brother have a band, and they wish to get their music out to as many as possible. Therefore I thought it would be a great thing to write about them here, in case someone here find them interesting.

Anyhow, they are called DecaDAZED, and the genre is what you can call Hard Rock’n’roll (atleast that is what they say themselves).

They have just recently made a video to one of their songs, called ‘Entrust Me’. It can be watched at the following YouTube-link here.

They also got a MySpace-account, which is called DecaDAZED, just like their band-name (obviously). So if you like their video, you perhaps might want to check them out there aswell…

Hope you like.
